volume2_ch1_fsm: Attractors are FSMs that satisfy additional stability and uniqueness requirements.
volume2_ch2_proto_particles: Proto-particles are attractors whose identity persists across layers and interactions.
volume2_ch3_proto_forces: Attractors act as localized sources for proto-forces.
volume2_ch4_fields: Attractors generate semantic fields that extend outward as ψ/λ/μ distributions.
volume1_ch8_sigma: Σ determines whether an FSM converges to an attractor or dissipates.
volume1_ch10_engine: Attractors are stable fixed points under the full IGSOA computational engine.
